page.title: 02RECREATION
page.content:
RECREATION
IN SPRING,I GO POND DIPPING WITH A FRIEND,WE FIND FROGSPAWN. I EMPTY MY NET INTO A LARGE BOWL,THEN I ROLL UP MY SLEEVES AND PLUNGE MY HAND INTO THE COLD WATERS.I THEN BRING UP SOME WEEDS AND PUT SOME IN MY BOWL. IN THE SUMMER MY MUM TAKES ME DOWM TO THE CLIMBING TREE,JUST ON THE EDGE OF THE WOODS. THERE IS A LITTLE CLEARING IN THE GRASS WHICH LEADS DOWN TO IT. THE CLIMBING TREE IS AN OLD FALLEN DOWN TREE WITH LOTS OF BRANCHES. OFTEN WHEN WE GO THERE WE TAKE A PICNIC. IN THE AUTUMN I GO WITH MY DAD AND SISTERS BLACKBERRY PICKING. MY DAD USUALLY PICKS THE MOST. IN WINTER, AT SCHOOL, WE HAVE GAMES ON THE COMMON AND THE BOYS PLAY FOOTBALL.
